CustomOptOut.ShowEditorDescription: Enable this option to show the "custom css" code in a simple css editor.
CustomOptOut.EditorThemeDescription: Choose a theme for the editor.
CustomOptOut.OptOutDntFound: You are not being tracked since your browser is reporting that you do not want to. This is a setting of your browser so you won't be able to opt-in until you disable the 'Do Not Track' feature.
